responseText: Well, it's a bit mysterious. Trade caravans have been held up and even robbed along the eastward roads, but unlike the highwaymen in the hills up north, these seem to be looking for something specific. Even more strange, it seems like the attacks are targeting Kaelar caravans over Vaelune ones. I hope we're not seeing a reemergence of old tensions between our people. I won't know until someone brings me more information, though.
name: SQ_RVR_NPC_SamiasHope_Amira_14_Response
